TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 通过客户端应用程序服务实现窗体身份验证。

span.span: Enables forms authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用窗体身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要启用表单身份验证，你配置应用程序以使用类。To enable forms authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 完成配置后，可以验证用户通过调用`static`方法，在内部调用方法。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 窗体身份验证要求用户指定通过登录控件由你的应用程序提供其凭据。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 可以检索凭据，并将它们传递给方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 此外可以传递空字符串或`null`使用凭据提供程序。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 凭据提供程序是实现你的应用程序配置文件中指定。A credentials provider is an implementation specified in your application configuration file. 通常情况下将实现方法以显示登录对话框并返回填充对象。You will typically implement the method to display a login dialog box and return a populated object. 使用凭据提供程序，让你可以在多个应用程序间共享单点登录对话框。Using a credentials provider enables you to share a single login dialog box among multiple applications. 方法所指示的登录服务的用户进行身份验证属性。The method authenticates users through the login service indicated by the property. 值通常从应用程序配置文件以及其他配置值检索属性。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 如果用户成功通过身份验证，服务提供商设置`static`属性设置为一个新对象，其中包含一个新对象，其中包含用户信息。If the user is successfully authenticated, the service provider sets the `static` property to a new object that contains a new object that contains the user information. 如果配置为应用程序，可以使用对象检索角色服务的用户角色信息。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 可以检索与当前的引用实例通过`static`属性。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 可以使用成员资格提供程序引用来调用直接方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，还需要要调用的成员资格提供程序引用方法，在中不可用基类。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. 不能使用类来创建、 删除或修改成员身份信息。You cannot use the class to create, delete, or modify membership information. 若要创建、 删除或修改用户，必须更改服务器上的登录名服务的配置。To create, delete, or modify users, you must change the configuration of the login service on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以验证此用户通过使用实现。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

span.span: The friendly name of the provider.

param.name: config

span.span: A collection of name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]扩展性模型调用方法来初始化在应用程序配置文件中使用的信息。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 此方法可以识别以下身份验证服务配置属性：This method recognizes the following authentication service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `savePasswordHashLocally` - `credentialsProvider` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md).

exception.span: - 或 - 包含无法识别的值。

MemberSignature.Value: public void Logout ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed
Public Sub Logout ()
public: void Logout();
member this.Logout : unit -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除 cookie 缓存中的所有身份验证 cookie 并重置`static`属性设置为对象，其中包含当前。The method clears all authentication cookies from the cookie cache and resets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 调用此方法后，当前用户不能再进行了身份验证客户端应用程序服务。After you call this method, the current user is no longer authenticated for client application services. 这意味着您不能检索通过角色类，并通过设置类。This means that you cannot retrieve roles through the class and settings through the class. 但是，因为用户可能具有有效的 Windows 标识，您仍可能会收到`true`如下所示的代码中的值： `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated`。However, because the user might have a valid Windows identity, you might still receive a `true` value from code such as the following: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated`. 若要确定用户是否为客户端应用程序服务进行身份验证，请确认属性值为通过检索`static`属性是引用。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, confirm that the property value of the retrieved through the `static` property is a reference. 然后，检查属性。Then, check the property. 若要重新进行身份验证当前用户，请调用方法或`static`方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method or the `static` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法来注销用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Form1.cs#070)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Form1.vb#070)]

exception.span: 属性值为 ，并且成员资格提供程序无法访问身份验证服务。

span.span: The property value is and the membership provider is unable to access the authentication service.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证服务的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性在应用程序代码中，但你通常将应用程序配置文件中设置值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这使您无需重新编译你的代码更改的服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置身份验证服务位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the authentication service location. 当以编程方式设置服务位置时，必须指定完整的服务 URI，它将始终以"Authentication_JSON_AppService.axd"结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Authentication_JSON_AppService.axd". [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#301)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#301)]

exception.span: 获取此属性时，未在应用程序配置文件中发现任何服务 URI，并且以前未设置过此属性。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

member this.UserValidated : EventHandler<System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.UserValidatedEventArgs>

summary.span: 在用户通过验证后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user is validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在用户成功通过验证后，将发生此事件。This event occurs only after the user is successfully validated. 可以使用此事件来更新以反映当前的用户应用程序。You can use this event to update your application to reflect the current user. 例如，可以使用属性在应用程序用户界面 (UI) 中显示的用户名。For example, you can use the property to display the user name in your application user interface (UI). 通过调用可以重新以无提示方式验证用户方法。You can silently revalidate users by calling the method. 因此，应避免使用事件，以显示侵入式 UI。Therefore, you should avoid using the event to display intrusive UI. 例如，不应使用事件，以显示欢迎对话框。For example, you should not use the event to display a welcome dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来显示窗体的标题栏中的用户名称。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display the user name in the title bar of a form. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#305)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#305)]

summary.span: 使用指定的凭据对用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified credentials.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ValidateUser (string username, string password);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ValidateUser(string username, string password) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String) As Boolean
public: override bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password);
override this.ValidateUser : string * string -> bool

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: username
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的名称，或者 或 ，以便从配置此应用程序要使用的 实现中检索凭据。

span.span: The name of the user to authenticate, or or to retrieve credentials from the implementation that this application is configured to use.

param.name: password
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的密码。

span.span: The password of the user to authenticate.

summary.span: 使用指定的用户名和密码对用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password.

returns.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用窗体身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证的用户，通常会调用`static`方法，在内部调用方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以直接调用此方法，如示例部分中所示。Alternatively, you can call this method directly, as shown in the Example section. 窗体身份验证要求用户指定通过登录控件由你的应用程序提供其凭据。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 可以检索凭据，并将它们传递给方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 此外可以传递空字符串或`null`使用凭据提供程序。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用客户端应用程序服务来实现用户登录](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Implement User Login with Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以验证此用户通过使用实现。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. 此示例要求您配置应用程序以使用凭据提供程序。This example requires that you to configure your application to use a credentials provider. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

exception.span: 属性值为 ，并且成员资格提供程序无法访问身份验证服务。

span.span: The property value is and the membership provider is unable to access the authentication service.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateUser (string username, string password, bool rememberMe);
.method public hidebysig instance bool ValidateUser(string username, string password, bool rememberMe) cil managed
Public Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String, rememberMe As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, bool rememberMe);
override this.ValidateUser : string * string * bool -> bool

span.span: The name of the user to authenticate.

param.name: password
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的密码。

span.span: The password of the user to authenticate.

param.name: rememberMe
param.span: 如果为 ，则将密码的哈希值存储在本地数据缓存中，以便脱机使用或者在用户身份验证 Cookie 过期后自动重新进行身份验证；如果为 ，则禁用脱机登录，或者要求在 Cookie 过期后重新进行身份验证。

span.span: to store a hash of the password in the local data cache for offline use and for automatic reauthentication when the user authentication cookie expires; to disable offline login or to require users to reauthenticate when the cookie expires.

summary.span: 使用指定的用户名和密码对用户进行身份验证，并可以选择将密码的哈希值存储在本地数据缓存中。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password, optionally storing a hash of the password in the local data cache.

returns.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用窗体身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证的用户，通常会调用`static`方法，在内部调用方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，可以调用直接方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. 您可以调用此重载以传入`rememberMe`值设置为除`username`和`password`值。You can call this overload to pass in a `rememberMe` value in addition to the `username` and `password` values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法在应用程序代码中使用登录控件验证用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using login controls in your application code. 此示例需要名为控件`usernameTextBox`、 一个名为控件`passwordTextBox`，和一个控件命名为`rememberMeCheckBox`。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox`, a control named `passwordTextBox`, and a control named `rememberMeCheckBox`. summary.span: 使用指定的用户名和密码对位于指定服务 URI 处的用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates a user at the specified service URI by using the specified user name and password.

returns.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过使用窗体身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证的用户，通常会调用`static`方法，在内部调用方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，可以调用直接方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. 您可以调用此重载，以访问指定的位置处的身份验证服务`serviceUri`参数。You can call this overload to access an authentication service at the location specified by the `serviceUri` parameter. 使用此重载是设置的替代方法属性并调用重载。Using this overload is an alternative to setting the property and calling the overload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法来验证用户完成身份验证服务中指定的位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user through an authentication service at a specified location. 从应用程序代码中的登录控件检索用户凭据。The user credentials are retrieved from login controls in your application code. 此示例需要名为控件`usernameTextBox`和一个控件命名为`passwordTextBox`。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox` and a control named `passwordTextBox`. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#308](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#308)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#308](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#308)]
